ABOUT THE SERVICE

## Why Choose GetBlock as Your  
Node Service Provider?

Quick Assistance

Fast personal consulting for both beginners and experienced developers.

Helpful Docs

Technical guides, node endpoints & methods, API references, and much more.

Custom SLAs

Fully featured SLAs based on your project performance and business model.

Go to Account

WHO CAN USE GETBLOCK

## Powerful Toolkit for Instant  
Integration with Web3

Our stack of technical solutions for the largest crypto nodes list is set to
give an  
‘unfair advantage’ to dApp developers of all segments.

Request Demo

## Decentralized  
Finances (DeFis)

Our cryptocurrency node hosting platform on-boards all sorts of DeFis
including exchanges, yield optimizers, stablecoins and non-custodial lending
instruments.  
  
As we provide users with the access to 40+ blockchain nodes, cross-chain DeFis
can also leverage our instruments.

## Non-custodial  
crypto wallets

GetBlock’s APIs can be integrated into self-custodial wallets to allow
lightning fast transfers and swaps with minimal fees.  
  
Also, we can help merchants start accepting crypto as payment methods in
e-commerce. Just like that, turn your wallet into a next cross-chain gem.

## Play-to-Earn Games  
& NFT Marketplaces

GetBlock supports all major blockchains for Play-to-Earn, GameFi and NFT
segments (Ethereum, Polygon, BNB Chain, Solana) so it can adjust node
infrastructure for every business model.  
  
We can build a ‘Blockchain-as-a-Service’ module for GameFi or integrate it
into existing products.

DEVELOPMENT FROM SCRATCH

## Bringing Web3 to Any  
Project in a Few Clicks

## Seamless Experience with  
GetBlock APIs

To start deploying your products on GetBlock’s nodes today, you should simply
choose the ones you need from over 40 mainstream and exotic blockchains. We
allow developers to focus on their business instead of running a crypto node.

## Node Infrastructure for  
Industry Leaders

GetBlock is ready to find a perfect solution for every Web3 business. Connect
your software to a cost-efficient shared node or superior dedicated node. With
a dedicated node ordered, a special high-end hardware module is booked for
your tasks.

SHARED NODES

DEDICATED NODES

## Private Blockchain Nodes  
Built to Boost Up Your Project

Dedicated Node for BNB Smart Chain (Binance Smart Chain) (BSC)

Reach out to us & learn more about conditions and pricing!

Contact Us

Get exclusive access to archive data!

Use various API interfaces: JSON-RPC, WS, GraphQL, etc.

Connect to any network (mainnet, testnet, etc.)

Integrate with any 3rd-party software to be run by your demand

Contact Us

No Rate Limits

There are no limits neither for the number of requests nor for request/sec
(RpS).

MultiChain Support

We can provide a dedicated server for any supported blockchain by request.

Custom Settings

Our team is able to set up your node as needed and add custom configuration.

WORKING GLOBALLY

## We’re Trusted  
by Top Teams

From testing to full-scale development!

Before GetBlock entered the scene, we had just one option which was to build
our nodes from scratch, because all of the existing third-party solutions were
super limiting and wasn’t serving much.  
  
But while we were about to start building our nodes for the Lead Wallet full
version app, we discovered GetBlock.io, and the rest is history as we have
since abandoned the thoughts of building our nodes for each of the blockchains
we support.

Obasi Francis Ifegwu

Co-founder & CEO at Lead Wallet

Before GetBlock entered the scene, we had just one option which was to build
our nodes from scratch, because all of the existing third-party solutions were
super limiting and wasn’t serving much.  
  
But while we were about to start building our nodes for the Lead Wallet full
version app, we discovered GetBlock.io, and the rest is history as we have
since abandoned the thoughts of building our nodes for each of the blockchains
we support.

Obasi Francis Ifegwu

Co-founder & CEO at Lead Wallet

ConsenSys is very happy to be working closely with GetBlock to help provide a
rich and seamless onboarding experience to BESU.  
  
Getting up and running is fast and easy, and there are a variety of support
tools available to monitor and manage your BESU nodes.

Tom Lindeman

Former Director of Strategic Initiatives at Consensys

GetBlock has helped us in providing a secure and speedy infrastructure for
Zeedex BSC-based exchange. We appreciate the BSC nodes service by Getblock as
it is cost-efficient, fast and reliable.

Kyunghun Cheong

Founder at Zeedex

CONTACT US

## Get in Touch!

If you have any questions about our service, want to team up or leave  
feedback, send us a message and we will get back to you shortly.
